event.title: I Love Free Software Day Warsaw, Poland

body.p: We're celebrating the ‘I Love Free Software Day’ with Free Software Foundation Europe's (FSFE) and Warsaw Hackerspace. The celebrations will be on the 12th of February 2025, 18:00 (CET) at the Warsaw Hackerspace, Hackerspace address: Żelazna 103A, 01-017 Warsaw. This year we're focusing on discovering hidden/less known projects to the audience. Agenda and more information coming soon.
